title: PL vs Bundesliga All-Star Game?
description:
The FC crew look ahead to this weekend's North London Derby and argue if Tottenham or Arsenal can make their mark on the title race with a win. Plus, the guys discuss the possibility of a PL vs Bundesliga All-star game and question if Lionel Messi and Barcelona should consider a reunion next year.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Can Arsenal or Tottenham take charge in the title race?; Antonio Conte's future with Tottenham; PL vs Bundesliga All-star game?
